topic.title: What Linux system should I install?
topic.body: Hello everyone, soon I get an old pc from a relative of mine, and I would like to put a Linux distro, which one should I wear?

1603695205_1Cy3ntkN2GN9MH6EaW6eHpi4YoRS2.body: I have put ZeroNet in my Raspberry, and then when I want I display it wherever I want (Phone, Windows PC, Linux PC), and as a Browser I use Tor, so I am 100% anonymous.

1603720448_1CpcxT1xWtqTRZTRR1KnH8gGsY2i4.body: If I'm not mistaken, you can't remove this thing. The creator of ZeroTalk should change this thing.

1600200644_1DnpB2yFpVwyhA29h2rRsifGVEC1s.body: The problem of these sites to play on ZeroNet, and that of the peers, because if it is not very well known, the site will take you a lot of time to: load, save, select etc .... So I do not recommend playing the sites of ZeroNet with games (unless they have many peers). Anyway I know this site: http://127.0.0.1:43110/1Ag6xidDHiPgWoDKhfSx4xFQr6WC3NqxZg/?/play

> [smashbuckler](#comment_49_114yCZGnUqTUcasBbAKUS6xmhQyDPC1ZXt): I keep getting an error: [...]

Test this: : http://127.0.0.1:43110/1Ag6xidDHiPgWoDKhfSx4xFQr6WC3NqxZg
